data.enText: weak and easily hurt physically or emotionally
data.chText: （身体上或感情上）脆弱的，易受…伤害的

data.enText: She looked very vulnerable standing there on her own.
data.chText: 她独自站在那里，看上去弱不禁风。

data.enText: In cases of food poisoning, young children are especially vulnerable.
data.chText: 遇到食物中毒，幼儿尤其容易受危害。

data.enText: The sudden resignation of the financial director put the company in a very vulnerable position .
data.chText: 财务部主任的突然辞职使得这家公司岌岌可危。

data.enText: the vulnerability of newborn babies to disease

means: (身体上或感情上)易受…伤害的

ex.zh: 易受伤害的儿童/人们/妇女

tr: capable of being wounded or hurt
susceptible to criticism or persuasion or temptation

example.ex: Old people are particularly vulnerable members of our society.
example.tran: 老年人是社会中尤为明显的弱势群体。

value.def: Someone who is vulnerable is weak and without protection, with the result that they are easily hurt physically or emotionally.

example.tran: 戴维承认了自己的脆弱。

example.ex: People with high blood pressure are especially vulnerable to diabetes...
example.tran: 有高血压的人尤其易患糖尿病。

example.ex: Plants that are growing vigorously are less likely to be vulnerable to disease.
example.tran: 生命力强的植物不容易得病。

value.def: If a person, animal, or plant is vulnerable to a disease, they are more likely to get it than other people, animals, or plants.
value.tran: 易感染（某种疾病）的；易患病的

example.ex: Taking long-term courses of certain medicines may increase vulnerability to infection.
example.tran: 长期服用某类药品可能会增加感染的可能性。

example.ex: Their tanks would be vulnerable to attack from the air...
example.tran: 他们的坦克易受到空袭。

example.ex: ...a table showing which cars are most  vulnerable to theft...
Goodyear could be vulnerable in a prolonged economic slump.
example.tran: 经济长期疲软可能会对固特异公司造成影响。

value.def: Something that is vulnerable can be easily harmed or affected by something bad.
value.tran: 易受伤害的;易受影响的

example.ex: ...anxieties about the country's vulnerability to invasion.
example.tran: 对于国家易受侵犯的焦虑

trans: 易受伤害的儿童/人们/妇女

partsOfSpeech.dec: avail 有利,有用 + -able 可...的
enjoy v.享受的乐趣 + -able 可...的
admir(e) 钦佩;赞美 + -able 可...的
un- 否定 + bear v.携带 + -able 可...的
un- 否定 + believ(e) 相信 + -able 可...的
valu(e) 价值,重视 + -able 可...的
advis(e) 建议,劝告 + -able 可...的
ap- 朝,向 + lic 准许 + -able 可...的
con- 共同, 一起 + sider- 星星 + -able 可...的
in- 不,无 + dis- 分开,分离 + pens 悬挂 + -able 可...的
suit n.一套衣服 + -able 可...的
vari- 变化,多变 + -able 可...的
in- 不,无 + numer 数目 + -able 可...的
favor 喜欢,支持 + -able 可...的
soci 同伴,结交,联合 + -able 可...的
not(e) 留意,注意 + -able 可...的
in- 不,无 + valu(e) 价值,重视 + -able 可...的
